title: 菊花賞の後に・敗北を越え、次の憧れへ

text_block_list.text: First place is Rice Shower. Mihono Bourbon offers words of praise to her. The two promise to face each other again in the senior class.
Meanwhile, Matikanetannhauser, who missed out on victory. While letting her frustration show, her forward-looking attitude remains unchanged, saying, 'Next time!'
After returning home, at Matikanetannhauser's suggestion, they set their next major goal as the Tenno Sho (Spring)' while—
It was decided that they would include one long-distance race before spring, so the next target race is set as the 'Diamond Stakes'!
